resources.string: This is Chaos Ping-Pong tutorial.\nYou can do it interactive by pressing button below.
First of all you have to understand, that this game is not normal ping-pong.\nYou can use abilities! - change them in \"Options\".
Now about controls:\n\nTo move your platform, simply tap on screen, and then platform\'ll go to this position (on Y axis).
To use abilities tap them on the bottom of the screen. But warning! - Some abilities have to be used on field after charged.

One of game feature is Events.

There are two types of them: Global and Normal.
Normal has blue marker, happens every 15 seconds,
when Global happens every minute, has red marker and won't be reversed.
Spawns an obstacle in tapped position after charged
Spawns a smoke in tapped position after charged
tap on abilities to show their description
